context.theme: Match existing REOS design - oklch color system, Shadcn components, dark/light mode support, primary purple (oklch 0.546-0.623), rounded-xl borders, subtle shadows
components_to_build: Services Grid - Main services showcase section
Process Steps - How it works timeline

user_stories.title: Define Services Grid Requirements
user_stories.description: Use prd-architect to define detailed requirements for the Services Grid component including service cards, icons, and responsive layout
acceptance_criteria: Service card structure defined (icon, title, description, CTA)
Services list defined with real REOS service offerings

user_stories.title: Define Process Steps Requirements
user_stories.description: Use prd-architect to define requirements for the Process Steps section showing how REOS works
acceptance_criteria: Step structure defined (number, title, description, visual)

user_stories.title: Define Team Section Requirements
user_stories.description: Use prd-architect to define requirements for the Team Section with member cards
acceptance_criteria: Team card structure defined (photo, name, role, bio, social links)

user_stories.title: Implement Services Grid Component
user_stories.description: Use ui-designer to implement the Services Grid section with service cards

user_stories.title: Implement Process Steps Component
user_stories.description: Use ui-designer to implement the Process Steps timeline section
acceptance_criteria: Step items with numbers and connectors

user_stories.title: Implement Team Section Component
user_stories.description: Use ui-designer to implement the Team Section with member cards

user_stories.title: Write Services Grid Copy
user_stories.description: Use kohelet-copywriter to write compelling marketing copy for all services
acceptance_criteria: Each service has title (3-5 words) and description (2-3 sentences)
CTA text for each service card

user_stories.title: Write Process Steps Copy
user_stories.description: Use kohelet-copywriter to write clear, engaging copy for each process step
acceptance_criteria: Each step has title and description
Copy guides user through the journey

user_stories.title: Write Team Section Copy
user_stories.description: Use kohelet-copywriter to write section intro and placeholder bios
acceptance_criteria: Placeholder team member names and roles

user_stories.title: Create Landing Page Route
user_stories.description: Create the landing page route that composes all sections
acceptance_criteria: Landing page exists at src/app/(marketing)/page.tsx or similar
All three sections imported and composed

user_stories.title: Final Polish and Verification
user_stories.description: Review all components, ensure consistency, and verify build
acceptance_criteria: Dark mode works across all sections

implementation_order: Phase 1: PRD Definition - Use prd-architect agent for PRD-01, PRD-02, PRD-03 (can run in parallel)
Phase 2: UI Implementation - Use ui-designer agent for UI-01, UI-02, UI-03 (after respective PRDs)
Phase 3: Copywriting - Use kohelet-copywriter agent for COPY-01, COPY-02, COPY-03 (after respective UIs)
Phase 4: Integration - Use senior-frontend-dev for INT-01, INT-02
